name: Andrew's talks at ACCU 2012
body:
If you're here you're probably interested in the slides and source code for my ACCU 2012 talks:

Algebraic Datatypes in C++ and When Only C Will Do.

I will put some better and more direct links up here soon, but in the meantime just checkout the repo attached to this page.

If you have any comments please contact me: [Andrew Stitcher](mailto:astitcher@apache.org)
tagline: Material for my talks at ACCU2012
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
